Posts.Content: Jul 2, 2010 07:43PM anmaree wrote: Hi all,  I have mets in my pelvis and just recently really struggling with what feels like a pinched nerve - came on really suddenly.  My markers had been going beserk (we were hoping it was a tumour flare due to med change for gradualy increasing markers!?!). Really struglling with the "burning" pain that is all the way down the leg in different places now and then - mostly burning ankle, sometimes the thigh, and quite often the butt.  Sometimes the whole leg feels "dead" although it is otherwise perfectly fine - ie I can run/walk stretch etc bu the pain is just there. Have given up on normal painkillers that certainly don't work at night and have my first prescription painkiller (endone) -  to try tonight. - here is hoping I get past the early hours of the morning - I could do with a reasonable night sleep! Scan and blood test again on monday to see what's going on.... So would also love to hear what works as the neurofen and panadol osteo are not enough. Nanalinda - I like the idea of no pain.. it is amazing how it influences one.
Posts.Title: Pinched nerve treatments? KasSha Lowrider54
